mapper.select: select wid,cno,cname,base_no,title,content,uploadDate,uploadNo,base_class,endDate,file from work where base_class=#{base_class} and base_no=#{base_no}
SELECT w.wid,w.cno,w.cname,w.title,w.content,w.uploadDate,w.uploadNo,w.endDate,w.file,f.finishedfile FROM work w,finished f where w.wid=f.wid and f.stuno=#{stuno} and f.identity=0
mapper.delete: delete from finished where stuno=#{stuno} and wid=#{wid}
mapper.update: update finished set identity=1 where stuno=#{stuno} and wid=#{wid}
mapper.select: SELECT w.wid,w.cno,w.cname,w.title,w.content,w.uploadDate,w.uploadNo,w.file,w.endDate,f.finishedfile,p.result,p.comment,p.markedfile FROM work w,finished f,pigai p where w.wid=f.wid and f.wid=p.wid and f.stuno=#{stuno} and f.identity=1

select * from(select s.stuno,s.stu_name,s.cno,w.cname,w.title,w.wid from trainstudent s join work w WHERE s.base_class=#{base_class} and s.base_no=#{base_no}) c where not EXISTS (select stuno,wid from finished where stuno=c.stuno and wid=c.wid)
and c.title=#{title}

SELECT DISTINCT * from(select s.stuno,s.stu_name,s.cno,w.cname,w.title,w.wid from trainstudent s,work w,finished f WHERE s.base_class=#{base_class} and s.base_no=#{base_no}) c ,finished f where c.stuno=f.stuno and c.wid=f.wid
and c.title=#{title}
mapper.update: update finished set uploadDate=#{uploadDate},finishedfile=#{file} where stuno=#{stuno} and wid=#{wid}
